summary: Dead NPCs now equip the clothing, armor, ammo, and weapons that you place in their inventories.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34955-2-1366300885.png[/img][/center]
Requires SKSE!
Ever wanted to leave the dead in peace: properly clothed?
Ever taken a bandit\'s armor but then felt guilty leaving them naked?
With Clothe Dead NPCs, when you give a corpse an item of clothing or armor, some ammo, or a weapon, the dead NPC equips the item. Simple as that. :)
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34955-1-1366301587.gif[/img]
[youtube]VQ7SDSUdp4E[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002744[/img]
While playing through my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34766/]Royal Nordic Mod[/url] I decided I wanted to loot the draugr\'s heavily enchanted armor, but didn\'t want to leave the good king and queen naked. So I crafted them a set of unenchanted Royal Nordic, but they wouldn\'t equip it!
So I googled for a mod that would let me do so. I found one for [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/17137]Oblivion[/url] by Cipscis. Since there wasn\'t one for Skyrim though, I fiddled around in the CK a bit and wrote one up. While I later found out that Cipscis also made one for [url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/36779]Fallout New Vegas[/url], I never downloaded that mod or looked at its scripts (if it had any). From reading his descriptions, our mods also work a bit differently. However, I wanted to credit the person who implemented this idea in previous games. (Plus point people to those mods if you play those games).

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002748[/img]
I am currently not posting any mods on Steam Workshop. If you see one of my mods on Steam Workshop, please report the file to me. Thanks! :D

[center][url= http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding ][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url]
Check out my Facebook page![/center]
author: Iceburg

files.name: Clothe Dead NPCs 1-1
files.changelogHtml: The items you give to dead NPCs now stay equipped, even when you leave a cell and come back.
